Luminosity, Brightness:

Irradiance (Intensity) 
<!-- \footnote{Bestrahlungsstärke, Lichtstärke}  -->

$$\begin{split} &
[Candela] = [cd] \equiv \mathscr{I} = ...
\end{split}$${#eq-candela}


Radiance (Illuminance) 
<!-- \footnote{Strahldichte, Beleuchtungsstärke}  -->

$$\begin{split} &
[Lux] = 
[\frac{cd \cdot sr}{m^2}] \equiv
\mathscr{L} = 
\frac{\mathscr{I}}{F} \cdot \Omega = 
\frac{\mathscr{I}}{F}\cdot \frac{F}{r^2}
\end{split}$${#eq-lux}

If orthogonal illumination at receiver ($\varepsilon_b = 0$) and Flux Density (Radiant Intensity) $\mathscr{I}_g = \mathscr{I}_b$ then:

$$\begin{split} &
\frac{\mathscr{J}_g}{\mathscr{J}_b} = \frac{r_g^2}{r_b^2} \\&
\mathscr{I} = \frac{\mathscr{J}}{R^2} \iff \varepsilon_b=0 \iff  (\mathscr{A} \perp R)
\end{split}$${#eq-luminosity}
